title: Galio shield (Bulwark) doesn't work with windspeakers

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Galios shield (Bulwark) doesn't work with windspeakers blessing when it should, Wind speakers increases heals and shields by 10% which means technically it should increase the amount of armour and mr you get from it eg, rank 5 w (Bulwark) gives 90 mr and armour and with windspeakers it should give 99 mr and armour. Also it says if you cast a shield or heal on an ally other than yourself it increases their resistances by 15% which it doesn't with Galios shield (Bulwark) which means either the tool tip is wrong with windspeakers or it's broken.
